name: nmcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cr))

stmt.origin: ffvelrnda(c1, c2, c3, cr, wcel(c0, cngp))
stmt.pretty: ffvelrnda(c1, c2, c3, cr, c0 ∈ NrmGrp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wf(c3, c2, cr))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ ℝ)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp →(c3 : c2 → ℝ))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wf(c3, c2, cr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ ℝ)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp →(c3 : c2 → ℝ))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wf(c3, c2, cr))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp →(c3 : c2 → ℝ))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(norm ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cr))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ ℝ)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(norm ` c0)

comment: The norm of a normed group is closed in the reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
